name: Grapecheese
description:
Welcome to the amazing dumpsterfire world of Grapecheese!

It's a silly little place full of adventure, and colorful characters to meet!

Fight an evil fire god from hell! Listen to some banging tunes, we have it all!

(Made for Ludum Dare 50, so it's a bit rushed and buggy but we're proud of it :))

Controls:

WASD (move), ARROW KEYS (shoot), E (talk)

Credits:

Art and music: me :)

Programming and game design: LANIK2000 (https://lanik2000.itch.io/)

Font used: Daydream by DoubleGum (https://www.dafont.com/daydream-3.font)

FAQ: Q: Camera got stuck in a dungeon, help!

A: Not my problem (you have to die and respawn in a different room).

Q: Will there ever be an update?

A: Good question...

Q: You've got a typo, idiot!

A: That's umpossible!
